#summary How to set up development environment

= Introduction =

This page describe the process of the setting up the Mono.Xna development environment.

= Linux =

== MonoDevelop 2.0 ==

 * Download the entire project from the repository
 * Set executable priviledge on ./tools/Prebuild/prebuild and ./MonoDevelo.sh
 * Run ./MonoDevelop.sh
 * Open the generated .sln with MonoDevelop 2.0
 * Remove the XnaTests from both Debug and Release configuration in order to build
